statements: SELECT * FROM budget_planning WHERE category = 'Food';
SELECT id, category, amount FROM budget_planning ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM budget_planning WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM budget_planning GROUP BY category;
SELECT id, category, allocated_amount FROM budget_planning WHERE amount > allocated_amount ORDER BY category ASC, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM budget_planning WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM budget_planning GROUP BY category HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT id, category, allocated_amount FROM budget_planning WHERE category = 'Office Supplies' OR category = 'Marketing';
SELECT * FROM budget_planning WHERE allocated_amount < amount * 0.8 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT category, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM budget_planning GROUP BY category ORDER BY average_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM budget_planning;
SELECT id, category FROM budget_planning ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT purpose, allocation_amount FROM allocation WHERE budget_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM budget_planning WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, category, amount FROM budget_planning WHERE category = 'Travel';
SELECT * FROM budget_planning;
SELECT category, amount FROM budget_planning WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT b.category, a.purpose, a.allocation_amount FROM budget_planning b JOIN allocation a ON b.id = a.budget_id;
SELECT * FROM budget_planning ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM budget_planning GROUP BY category HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM budget_plans;
SELECT budget_name, allocated_amount FROM budget_plans WHERE allocated_amount > 1000;
SELECT plan_id, budget_name, start_date, end_date FROM budget_plans ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount < 500;
SELECT income_source, income_amount, received_date FROM income ORDER BY income_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM budget_plans WHERE start_date = '2022-01-01' AND allocated_amount > 1000 ORDER BY budget_name DESC;
SELECT budget_name, SUM(allocated_amount) AS total_budget FROM budget_plans GROUP BY budget_name HAVING COUNT(plan_id) > 1;
SELECT b.budget_name, e.expense_amount FROM budget_plans b JOIN expenses e ON b.plan_id = e.plan_id WHERE e.expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY e.expense_amount DESC;
SELECT i.income_source, i.income_amount, b.budget_name FROM income i LEFT JOIN budget_plans b ON i.income_amount > b.allocated_amount;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > (SELECT AVG(expense_amount) FROM expenses) ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM budgets;
SELECT amount, category FROM budgets ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, category FROM budgets WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, allocation_date, amount FROM allocations WHERE budget_id = 'c4e5a69d-5f5a-4b7e-8bb0-8ee80840b048';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM budgets WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT id, category, amount FROM budgets WHERE category = 'Groceries' ORDER BY amount DESC;

SELECT transactions.id, transactions.amount, budgets.category FROM transactions JOIN budgets ON transactions.budget_id = budgets.id WHERE transactions.amount > 500 ORDER BY transactions.transaction_date ASC;

SELECT allocations.allocation_date, allocations.amount, budgets.category FROM allocations JOIN budgets ON allocations.budget_id = budgets.id WHERE allocations.amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY allocations.amount DESC;
SELECT users.username, users.email, budgets.amount FROM users JOIN budgets ON users.id = budgets.id WHERE users.email LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY budgets.amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM Budget_Plans;
SELECT plan_name, allocated_amount FROM Budget_Plans ORDER BY allocated_amount DESC;
SELECT id, plan_name, allocated_amount FROM Budget_Plans WHERE allocated_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Expenses WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT id, expense_name, amount FROM Expenses WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM Budget_Plans WHERE allocated_amount > 10000;
SELECT plan_name, allocated_amount FROM Budget_Plans WHERE allocated_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT id, plan_name, allocated_amount FROM Budget_Plans ORDER BY allocated_amount DESC;
SELECT id, plan_name, allocated_amount FROM Budget_Plans WHERE plan_name LIKE '%Groceries%' AND allocated_amount < 5000;
SELECT SUM(allocated_amount) AS total_budget FROM Budget_Plans;
